original_title: Maggie And The Ferocious Beast - Let's Go to the Beach
overview: The Nowhere Land adventures continue with Maggie, The Ferocious Beast and Hamilton Hocks the pig, and you're invited to join them for some fun in the sun! Maggie, The Ferocious Beast and Hamilton are spending a lot of time at the beach, and boy are they having fun! They even meet some interesting new friends, like Sidestep the Crab and a bunch of very slow turtles. When it's too hot to go to the beach, they can always cool off in a wading pool. MAGGIE AND THE FEROCIOUS BEAST is an adventure to new places and meeting new faces, and in Nowhere Land, whether you're at sea or on the shore, you always have fun when your friends are with you!  EPISODES: Walk The Walk Out of Water Beast Sun Spots Sloooow Motion Hamilton's Box Car Sailing Away
title: Maggie And The Ferocious Beast - Let's Go to the Beach
